resources.string: Traditionally houses and mansions were decorated with gable stones: carved and painted stone tablets, fixed to the facade. Before Amsterdam introduced a system of street names, a building was referred to by its gable stone. Besides decorating the facade, a gable stone tells about the (former) owner, his profession or beliefs. Explore Amsterdam and immerse into its rich history in a unique and memorable way.

Follow the quest and locate the special gable stones. The quest leads you through picturesque streets and along idyllic canals. Discover hidden architectonic gems and enjoy the unique ambiance of Amsterdam\'s historic center.
